channel.title: Fixeds on toxinu
channel.description: Recent content in Fixeds on toxinu

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Geoffrey L., french full stack developer / SRE working remotely. My work is full of Python, Django, Javascript, React, Linux and Sysop. <3 Open source. You can reach my here. toxinu toxinu toxinu

item.title: Code
item.description: Below is a short list of projects I have created or worked on. You can find many more recent projects on Github or Gitlab. Sublimall - SublimeText 3 plugin to sync your configuration. ~560 stars Pyhn - Hacker News command line client. ~380 stars Requirements - Python requirements helper. ~300 stars Leselys - Web based RSS reader. ~220 stars Isit - Python environment discoverer.

item.title: Games
item.description: Below is a short list of games I have worked on mostly during game jams. Pod2000 - In Pod2000, you play an agent belonging to a huge corporation that exploits planets. To exploit a planet, you need to install modules to extract oil, refinery, etc. Fórnir - In Fórnir you play a Jarl who rules over a village. Try your best to keep the trust of your people by making good decisions…

item.title: Photography
item.description: Hardware: Fujifilm X-T10 (FUJINON XF35mmF2 R WR) Social media: Instagram Flickr 500px
